summary: Major Lex Kearney becomes the North's first counterespionage agent as he tries to discover who's behind the theft of Union cavalry horses in Colorado during the Civil War.
cast: Gary Cooper|Phyllis Thaxter|David Brian|Paul Kelly|Philip Carey|Lon Chaney Jr.|James Millican|Guinn 'Big Boy' Williams|Alan Hale Jr.|Martin Milner|Wilton Graff|Vince Barnett|George Bell|Ray Bennett|James Brown|Jerry Brown|Michael Chapin|Ben Corbett|George Eldredge|William Fawcett|Art Felix|Dick Gordon|Kit Guard|Richard Hale|Stuart Hall|Poodles Hanneford|Edward Hearn|Eric Hoeg|Fred Kelsey|Richard Lightner|Rory Mallinson|Philo McCullough|Ewing Mitchell|Jack Mower|Jerry O'Sullivan|Betty Jean Onge|Artie Ortego|Fess Parker|Mike Ragan|Ric Roman|George Ross|Ralph Sanford|George Sowards|Paula Sowl|William Steele|Jack Tornek|Tony Urchel|Jack Woody|Nedrick Young
director: Director: André De Toth (as Andre DeToth)
title: El honor del capitán Lex
